metadata.title: Vulnerability in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102 (CVE-2016-1670)
metadata.description: Race condition in the ResourceDispatcherHostImpl::BeginRequest function in content/browser/loader/resource_dispatcher_host_impl.cc in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102 allows remote attackers to make arbitrary HTTP requests by leveraging access to a renderer process and reusing a request ID.

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Google Chrome is less than 50.0.2661.102

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102 (CVE-2016-1669)
metadata.description: The Zone::New function in zone.cc in Google V8 before 5.0.71.47, as used in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102, does not properly determine when to expand certain memory allocations, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JavaScript code.

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Google Chrome is less than 50.0.2661.102

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102 (CVE-2016-1668)
metadata.description: The forEachForBinding function in WebKit/Source/bindings/core/v8/Iterable.h in the V8 bindings in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102, uses an improper creation context, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Google Chrome is less than 50.0.2661.102

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102 (CVE-2016-1667)
metadata.description: The TreeScope::adoptIfNeeded function in WebKit/Source/core/dom/TreeScope.cpp in the DOM implementation in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 50.0.2661.102, does not prevent script execution during node-adoption operations, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Google Chrome is less than 50.0.2661.102

metadata.title: Hypervisor Code Integrity Security Feature Bypass (CVE-2016-0181)
metadata.description: Microsoft Windows 10 Gold and 1511 allows local users to bypass the Virtual Secure Mode Hypervisor Code Integrity (HVCI) protection mechanism and perform RWX markings of kernel-mode pages via a crafted application, aka "Hypervisor Code Integrity Security Feature Bypass."

metadata.title: Out-of-bounds read in Skia - CVE-2016-1702
metadata.description: The SkRegion::readFromMemory function in core/SkRegion.cpp in Skia, as used in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79, does not validate the interval count, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via crafted serialized data.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 - CVE-2016-1703
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other impact via unknown vectors.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Use-after-free in Autofill - CVE-2016-1701
metadata.description: The Autofill implementation in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 mishandles the interaction between field updates and JavaScript code that triggers a frame deletion, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted web site, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-1690.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Parameter sanitization failure in DevTools - CVE-2016-1699
metadata.description: WebKit/Source/devtools/front_end/devtools.js in the Developer Tools (aka DevTools) subsystem in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79, does not ensure that the remoteFrontendUrl parameter is associated with a chrome-devtools-frontend.appspot.com URL, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via a crafted URL.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Information leak in Extension bindings - CVE-2016-1698
metadata.description: The createCustomType function in extensions/renderer/resources/binding.js in the extension bindings in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 does not validate module types, which might allow attackers to load arbitrary modules or obtain sensitive information by leveraging a poisoned definition.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Cross-origin bypass in Blink - CVE-2016-1697
metadata.description: The FrameLoader::startLoad function in WebKit/Source/core/loader/FrameLoader.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79, does not prevent frame navigations during DocumentLoader detach operations, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via crafted JavaScript code.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Use-after-free in Extensions - CVE-2016-1700
metadata.description: extensions/renderer/runtime_custom_bindings.cc in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 does not consider side effects during creation of an array of extension views, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to extensions.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Cross-origin bypass in extension bindings - CVE-2016-1696
metadata.description: The extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 51.0.2704.79 does not properly restrict bindings access, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via unspecified vectors.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 51.0.2704.79

metadata.title: Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability - CVE-2016-0186 (MS16-052)
metadata.description: The Chakra JavaScript engine in Microsoft Edge allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability," a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-0191 and CVE-2016-0193.

criteria.comment: Microsoft Edge is installed + Windows OS + file version
Windows OS is installed + file version
Microsoft Windows 10 is installed + file version

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Chakra.dll is less than 11.0.10240.16841

criteria.comment: Microsoft Windows 10 Version 1511 is installed + file version

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Chakra.dll is less than 11.0.10586.306

metadata.title: Padding oracle in AES-NI CBC MAC check - CVE-2016-2107
metadata.description: The AES-NI implementation in OpenSSL before 1.0.1t and 1.0.2 before 1.0.2h does not consider memory allocation during a certain padding check, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive cleartext information via a padding-oracle attack against an AES CBC session, NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incorrect fix for CVE-2013-0169.

criteria.comment: Check for vulnerable OpenSSL installation + vulnerable file version

criterion.comment: Check if OpenSSL 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t
Check if OpenSSL 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h
OpenSSL (32_bit) is installed
Check if OpenSSL 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t (x86)
Check if OpenSSL 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h (x86)
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t on ProgramFilesDir
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t on ProgramFilesDir (x86)
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t on System32 and SysWOW64
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h on ProgramFilesDir
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h on ProgramFilesDir (x86)
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h on System32 and SysWOW64

metadata.title: Memory corruption in the ASN.1 encoder - CVE-2016-2108
metadata.description: The ASN.1 implementation in OpenSSL before 1.0.1o and 1.0.2 before 1.0.2c allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (buffer underflow and memory corruption) via an ANY field in crafted serialized data, aka the "negative zero" issue.

criteria.comment: Check for vulnerable OpenSSL installation + vulnerable file version

criterion.comment: Check if OpenSSL 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1o
Check if OpenSSL 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2c
OpenSSL (32_bit) is installed

Check if OpenSSL 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2c (x86)

Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1o on ProgramFilesDir (x86)
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1o on System32 and SysWOW64
Check if ssleay32.dll 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2c on ProgramFilesDir

metadata.title: ASN.1 BIO excessive memory allocation - CVE-2016-2109
metadata.description: The asn1_d2i_read_bio function in crypto/asn1/a_d2i_fp.c in the ASN.1 BIO implementation in OpenSSL before 1.0.1t and 1.0.2 before 1.0.2h allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a short invalid encoding.

criteria.comment: Check for vulnerable OpenSSL installation + vulnerable file version

criterion.comment: Check if OpenSSL 1.0.1 version is greater than or equal 1.0.1 and less than 1.0.1t
Check if OpenSSL 1.0.2 version is greater than or equal 1.0.2 and less than 1.0.2h

metadata.title: Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability - CVE-2016-0028 (MS16-079)
metadata.description: Outlook Web Access (OWA) in Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 SP1, Cumulative Update 11, and Cumulative Update 12 and 2016 Gold and Cumulative Update 1 does not properly restrict loading of IMG elements, which makes it easier for remote attackers to track users via a crafted HTML e-mail message, aka "Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability."

metadata.title: Oracle Outside In Libraries Elevation of Privilege Vulnerabilities – CVE-2015-6015 (MS16-079)
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Outside In Technology component in Oracle Fusion Middleware 8.5.0, 8.5.1, and 8.5.2 allows local users to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-4808, CVE-2015-6013, CVE-2015-6014, and CVE-2016-0432. NOTE: the previous information is from the January 2016 CPU. Oracle has not commented on third-party claims that this issue is a stack-based buffer overflow in Oracle Outside In 8.5.2 and earlier, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Paradox DB file.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

metadata.title: Oracle Outside In Libraries Elevation of Privilege Vulnerabilities – CVE-2015-6014 (MS16-079)
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Outside In Technology component in Oracle Fusion Middleware 8.5.0, 8.5.1, and 8.5.2 allows local users to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Outside In Filters, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-4808, CVE-2015-6013, CVE-2015-6015, and CVE-2016-0432. NOTE: the previous information is from the January 2016 CPU. Oracle has not commented on third-party claims that this issue is a stack-based buffer overflow in Oracle Outside In 8.5.2 and earlier, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted DOC file.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

metadata.title: Windows Media Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - CVE-2016-0101 (MS16-027)
metadata.description: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, and Windows 10 Gold and 1511 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted media content, aka "Windows Media Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows 7 (32-bit) Service Pack 1 is installed
Microsoft Windows 7 x64 Service Pack 1 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 x64 Service Pack 1 is installed

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.7601.19145
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.7601.23346
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is greater than or equal to 12.0.7601.23000
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.9200.17647
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.9200.21766
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is greater than or equal to 12.0.9200.21000

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 is installed

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.9600.18228
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.10240.16724
Check if the version of Mfds.dll is less than 12.0.10586.162

metadata.title: Silverlight Runtime Remote Code Execution Vulnerability – CVE-2016-0034 (MS16-006)
metadata.description: Microsoft Silverlight 5 before 5.1.41212.0 mishandles negative offsets during decoding, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (object-header corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Silverlight Runtime Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Microsoft Silverlight + file version

criterion.comment: Check if Silverlight version is less than 5.1.41212.0

metadata.title: Win32k Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability - CVE-2016-3218 (MS16-073)
metadata.description: The kernel-mode drivers in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, and Windows 10 Gold and 1511 allow local users to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka "Win32k Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability," a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-3221.

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criteria.comment: vulnerable windows OS + vulnerable file version

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Vista (32-bit) Service Pack 2 is installed
Microsoft Windows Vista x64 Edition Service Pack 2 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 (32-bit) Service Pack 2 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 x64 Edition Service Pack 2 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Itanium-Based Edition Service Pack 2 is installed

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Win32k.sys is less than 6.0.6002.19657
Check if the version of Win32k.sys is less than 6.0.6002.23972
Check if the version of Win32k.sys is greater than or equal to 6.0.6002.23000

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows 7 (32-bit) Service Pack 1 is installed
Microsoft Windows 7 x64 Service Pack 1 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 x64 Service Pack 1 is installed
Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Itanium-Based Edition Service Pack 1 is installed

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Win32k.sys is less than 6.1.7601.23452
Check if the version of Win32k.sys is less than 6.2.9200.21861

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 is installed

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Win32k.sys is less than 6.3.9600.18340
Check if Win32k.sys version is less than 10.0.10240.16384
Check if win32k.sys version is less than 10.0.10586.20

metadata.title: Windows Virtual PCI Information Disclosure Vulnerability - CVE-2016-3232 (MS16-073)
metadata.description: The Virtual PCI (VPCI) virtual service provider in Microsoft Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2 allows local users to obtain sensitive information from uninitialized memory locations via a crafted application, aka "Windows Virtual PCI Information Disclosure Vulnerability."

contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criteria.comment: vulnerable windows OS + vulnerable file version

criterion.comment: Check if the version of Vpcivsp.sys is less than 6.2.9200.21872

extend_definition.comment: Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 is installed

metadata.title: MIME message modification memory corruption – CVE-2016-3644
metadata.description: The AntiVirus Decomposer engine in Symantec Advanced Threat Protection (ATP); Symantec Data Center Security:Server (SDCS:S) 6.x through 6.6 MP1; Symantec Web Gateway; Symantec Endpoint Protection (SEP) before 12.1 RU6 MP5; Symantec Endpoint Protection (SEP) for Mac; Symantec Endpoint Protection (SEP) for Linux before 12.1 RU6 MP5; Symantec Protection Engine (SPE) before 7.0.5 HF01, 7.5.x before 7.5.3 HF03, 7.5.4 before HF01, and 7.8.0 before HF01; Symantec Protection for SharePoint Servers (SPSS) 6.0.3 through 6.0.5 before 6.0.5 HF 1.5 and 6.0.6 before HF 1.6; Symantec Mail Security for Microsoft Exchange (SMSMSE) before 7.0_3966002 HF1.1 and 7.5.x before 7.5_3966008 VHF1.2; Symantec Mail Security for Domino (SMSDOM) before 8.0.9 HF1.1 and 8.1.x before 8.1.3 HF1.2; CSAPI before 10.0.4 HF01; Symantec Message Gateway (SMG) before 10.6.1-4; Symantec Message Gateway for Service Providers (SMG-SP) 10.5 before patch 254 and 10.6 before patch 253; Norton AntiVirus, Norton Security, Norton Internet Security, and Norton 360 before NGC 22.7; Norton Security for Mac before 13.0.2; Norton Power Eraser (NPE) before 5.1; and Norton Bootable Removal Tool (NBRT) before 2016.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via modified MIME data in a message.

metadata.title: Same origin bypass for images in Blink - CVE-2016-5145
metadata.description: Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, does not ensure that a taint property is preserved after a structure-clone operation on an ImageBitmap object derived from a cross-origin image, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via crafted JavaScript code.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Various fixes from internal audits, fuzzing and other initiatives - CVE-2016-5146
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116 allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other impact via unknown vectors.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Origin confusion in proxy authentication - CVE-2016-5133
metadata.description: Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 mishandles origin information during proxy authentication, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof a proxy-authentication login prompt or trigger incorrect credential storage by modifying the client-server data stream.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Parameter sanitization failure in DevTools - CVE-2016-5144
metadata.description: The Developer Tools (aka DevTools) subsystem in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, mishandles the script-path hostname, remoteBase parameter, and remoteFrontendUrl parameter, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5143.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: History sniffing with HSTS and CSP - CVE-2016-5137
metadata.description: The CSPSource::schemeMatches function in WebKit/Source/core/frame/csp/CSPSource.cpp in the Content Security Policy (CSP) implementation in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not apply http :80 policies to https :443 URLs and does not apply ws :80 policies to wss :443 URLs, which makes it easier for remote attackers to determine whether a specific HSTS web site has been visited by reading a CSP report. NOTE: this vulnerability is associated with a specification change after CVE-2016-1617 resolution.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Content-Security-Policy bypass - CVE-2016-5135
metadata.description: WebKit/Source/core/html/parser/HTMLPreloadScanner.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not consider referrer-policy information inside an HTML document during a preload request, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Content Security Policy (CSP) protection mechanism via a crafted web site, as demonstrated by a "Content-Security-Policy: referrer origin-when-cross-origin" header that overrides a "<META name='referrer' content='no-referrer'>" element.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Use after free in extensions - CVE-2016-5136
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in extensions/renderer/user_script_injector.cc in the Extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to script deletion.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Limited same-origin bypass in Service Workers - CVE-2016-5132
metadata.description: The Service Workers subsystem in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not properly implement the Secure Contexts specification during decisions about whether to control a subframe, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via an https IFRAME element inside an http IFRAME element.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Parameter sanitization failure in DevTools - CVE-2016-5143
metadata.description: The Developer Tools (aka DevTools) subsystem in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, mishandles the script-path hostname, remoteBase parameter, and remoteFrontendUrl parameter, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5144.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Use-after-free in libxml - CVE-2016-5131
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in libxml2 through 2.9.4, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to the XPointer range-to function.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: URL leakage via PAC script - CVE-2016-5134
metadata.description: net/proxy/proxy_service.cc in the Proxy Auto-Config (PAC) feature in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not ensure that URL information is restricted to a scheme, host, and port, which allows remote attackers to discover credentials by operating a server with a PAC script, a related issue to CVE-2016-3763.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: URL spoofing - CVE-2016-5130
metadata.description: content/renderer/history_controller.cc in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not properly restrict multiple uses of a JavaScript forward method, which allows remote attackers to spoof the URL display via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version is less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Errors in mp_div and mp_exptmod cryptographic functions in NSS - CVE-2016-1938
metadata.description: The s_mp_div function in lib/freebl/mpi/mpi.c in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.21, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 44.0, improperly divides numbers, which might make it easier for remote attackers to defeat cryptographic protection mechanisms by leveraging use of the (1) mp_div or (2) mp_exptmod function.

criteria.comment: Mozilla Firefox Mainline release is installed + version

extend_definition.comment: Mozilla Firefox Mainline release is installed

criterion.comment: Check if Mozilla Firefox Mainline version less than 44.0

metadata.title: The Web Cryptography API (aka WebCrypto) implementation in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116 - CVE-2016-5142
metadata.description: The Web Cryptography API (aka WebCrypto) implementation in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, does not properly copy data buffers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JavaScript code, related to NormalizeAlgorithm.cpp and SubtleCrypto.cpp.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Heap-based buffer overflow in the opj_j2k_read_SQcd_SQcc function in j2k.c in OpenJPEG, as used in PDFium in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116 - CVE-2016-5140
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the opj_j2k_read_SQcd_SQcc function in j2k.c in OpenJPEG, as used in PDFium in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JPEG 2000 data.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Multiple integer overflows in the opj_tcd_init_tile function in tcd.c in OpenJPEG, as used in PDFium in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116 - CVE-2016-5139
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflows in the opj_tcd_init_tile function in tcd.c in OpenJPEG, as used in PDFium in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JPEG 2000 data.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.title: Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar - CVE-2016-5141
metadata.description: Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.116, allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar via vectors involving a provisional URL for an initially empty document, related to FrameLoader.cpp and ScopedPageLoadDeferrer.cpp.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.116

metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the PK11_ImportDERPrivateKeyInfoAndReturnKey function in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.21.1, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 45.0, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted key data with DER encoding.

metadata.title: Same-origin policy violation using performance.getEntries and history navigation with session restore - CVE-2016-1967
metadata.description: Mozilla Firefox before 45.0 does not properly restrict the availability of IFRAME Resource Timing API times, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy and obtain sensitive information via crafted JavaScript code that leverages history.back and performance.getEntries calls after restoring a browser session. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2015-7207.

metadata.title: Use-after-free in NSS during SSL connections in low memory - CVE-2016-1978
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the ssl3_HandleECDHServerKeyExchange function in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.21, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 44.0, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact by making an SSL (1) DHE or (2) ECDHE handshake at a time of high memory consumption.

metadata.title: The PPAPI implementation in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not validate the origin of IPC messages to the plugin broker process - CVE-2016-1706
metadata.description: The PPAPI implementation in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not validate the origin of IPC messages to the plugin broker process that should have come from the browser process, which allows remote attackers to bypass a sandbox protection mechanism via an unexpected message type, related to broker_process_dispatcher.cc, ppapi_plugin_process_host.cc, ppapi_thread.cc, and render_frame_message_filter.cc.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: objects.cc in Google V8 before 5.2.361.27, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-5128
metadata.description: objects.cc in Google V8 before 5.2.361.27, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not prevent API interceptors from modifying a store target without setting a property, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Google V8 before 5.2.361.32, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-5129
metadata.description: Google V8 before 5.2.361.32, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not properly process left-trimmed objects, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JavaScript code.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: The Chrome Web Store inline-installation implementation in the Extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-1708
metadata.description: The Chrome Web Store inline-installation implementation in the Extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 does not properly consider object lifetimes during progress observation, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ByteArray::Get method in data/byte_array.cc in Google sfntly before 2016-06-10, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-1709
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ByteArray::Get method in data/byte_array.cc in Google sfntly before 2016-06-10, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted SFNT font.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Use-after-free vulnerability in WebKit/Source/core/editing/VisibleUnits.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-5127
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in WebKit/Source/core/editing/VisibleUnits.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JavaScript code involving an @import at-rule in a Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequence in conjunction with a rel=import attribute of a LINK element.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-1705
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other impact via unknown vectors.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: The ChromeClientImpl::createWindow method in WebKit/Source/web/ChromeClientImpl.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-1710
metadata.description: The ChromeClientImpl::createWindow method in WebKit/Source/web/ChromeClientImpl.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not prevent window creation by a deferred frame, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: WebKit/Source/core/loader/FrameLoader.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82 - CVE-2016-1711
metadata.description: WebKit/Source/core/loader/FrameLoader.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 52.0.2743.82, does not disable frame navigation during a detach operation on a DocumentLoader object, which allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 52.0.2743.82

metadata.title: Heap-based buffer overflow in the stagefright::SampleTable::parseSampleCencInfo function in libstagefright in Mozilla Firefox before 46.0, Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.8, and Firefox ESR 45.x before 45.1 - CVE-2016-2814
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the stagefright::SampleTable::parseSampleCencInfo function in libstagefright in Mozilla Firefox before 46.0, Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.8, and Firefox ESR 45.x before 45.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted CENC offsets that lead to mismanagement of the sizes table.

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 23.0.0.257 - CVE-2016-6936
metadata.description: Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 23.0.0.257 on Windows does not support Android runtime-analytics transport security, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by leveraging access to a network over which analytics data is sent.

criteria.comment: Adobe AIR is installed + affected version

criterion.comment: Check if Adobe AIR version is less than 23.0.0.257

metadata.title: Use after free in Blink - CVE-2016-5171
metadata.description: WebKit/Source/bindings/templates/interface.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113, does not prevent certain constructor calls, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JavaScript code.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: Use after free in Blink - CVE-2016-5170
metadata.description: WebKit/Source/bindings/modules/v8/V8BindingForModules.cpp in Blink, as used in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113, does not properly consider getter side effects during array key conversion, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted Indexed Database (aka IndexedDB) API calls.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: Arbitrary Memory Read in v8 - CVE-2016-5172
metadata.description: The parser in Google V8, as used in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113, mishandles scopes, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from arbitrary memory locations via crafted JavaScript code.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: browser/ui/cocoa/browser_window_controller_private.mm in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 does not process fullscreen toggle requests - CVE-2016-5174
metadata.description: browser/ui/cocoa/browser_window_controller_private.mm in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 does not process fullscreen toggle requests during a fullscreen transition, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (unsuppressed popup) via a crafted web site.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: The extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 does not properly restrict access to Object.prototype - CVE-2016-5173
metadata.description: The extensions subsystem in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 does not properly restrict access to Object.prototype, which allows remote attackers to load unintended resources, and consequently trigger unintended JavaScript function calls and bypass the Same Origin Policy via an indirect interception attack.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 allow attackers to cause a denial of service - CVE-2016-5175
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Google Chrome before 53.0.2785.113 allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other impact via unknown vectors.

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome version less than 53.0.2785.113

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Oracle MySQL through 5.5.52, 5.6.x through 5.6.33, and 5.7.x through 5.7.15; MariaDB before 5.5.51, 10.0.x before 10.0.27, and 10.1.x before 10.1.17 - CVE-2016-6662
metadata.description: Oracle MySQL through 5.5.52, 5.6.x through 5.6.33, and 5.7.x through 5.7.15; MariaDB before 5.5.51, 10.0.x before 10.0.27, and 10.1.x before 10.1.17; and Percona Server before 5.5.51-38.1, 5.6.x before 5.6.32-78.0, and 5.7.x before 5.7.14-7 allow local users to create arbitrary configurations and bypass certain protection mechanisms by setting general_log_file to a my.cnf configuration. NOTE: this can be leveraged to execute arbitrary code with root privileges by setting malloc_lib.
